== Instructions:
1. Extract anywhere (7Zip - link below) 
2. Open SmartSteamEmu.ini and edit "Target" to point to bms.exe (easy way to do this is to first move the extracted folder wherever you like, find bms.exe inside the folder, then right-click on bms.exe, select "Properties" (Win 7) and copy "Location" row, than paste into SmartSteamEmu.ini right there: 'Target = ' 
3. Run SmartSteamLoader.exe and play!
